m.id AS meal_id, m.meal_type, m.total_kcal AS m_total_kcal, m.total_carb_g AS m_total_carb_g, m.total_protein_g AS m_total_protein_g, m.total_fat_g AS m_total_fat_g, m.total_sugar_g AS m_total_sugar_g, m.total_natrium_g AS m_total_natrium_g,
